mapper.select: /* SQL ID: www.api.sys.cmmnCodeCl.CmmnCodeCl.selectCmmnCodeClListCount Description : 목록에서 레코드수 Query */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_CMMN_CODE_CL

/* SQL ID: www.api.sys.cmmnCodeCl.CmmnCodeCl.selectCmmnCodeClDetail Description : 상세조회 Query */ SELECT CODE_CL_ID ,CODE_CL ,CODE_CL_NM ,USE_AT ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATED_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATED_DT ,DATE_FORMAT(UPDATED_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATED_DT
FROM TB_CMMN_CODE_CL WHERE CODE_CL_ID = #{codeClId}
mapper.update:
/* SQL ID: www.api.sys.cmmnCodeCl.CmmnCodeCl.updateCmmnCodeCl Description : 수정 Query */ UPDATE TB_CMMN_CODE_CL
CODE_CL = #{codeCl},
CODE_CL_NM = #{codeClNm},
USE_AT = #{useAt},
CREATED_DT = STR_TO_DATE(NULLIF(CONCAT(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{createdDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '), CASE WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{createdDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '))=16 THEN ':00' ELSE '' END),''), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
UPDATED_DT = STR_TO_DATE(NULLIF(CONCAT(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{updatedDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '), CASE WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REPLACE(#{updatedDt}, 'T',' '), '.', 1),'Z',''),'T',' '))=16 THEN ':00' ELSE '' END),''), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
WHERE CODE_CL_ID = #{codeClId}
